name: 3D Platformer (kristinamalkowski)
description:
This is my 3D Platformer Project after making modifications. 

The Finished Modifications:

1. I created a new level, with more enemies, less light, and jumping platforms to dodge attacks. 

2.  I made a custom song to play during the levels by using the app.  I used the composer feature in the app My Singing Monsters.

3.  I created a custom song to play during the main menu section of my game. I used the composer feature in the app My Singing Monsters.

Credits:

Created by Kristina Malkowski
